H0.text: What is the name of the Jewish spring festival which celebrates the exodus of the Israelites from Egypt. Hag Ha'aviv

H1.text: What is the name of the Jewish spring festival which celebrates the exodus of the Israelites from Egypt. Z'man Cheruteinu

H2.text: What is the name of the Jewish spring festival which celebrates the exodus of the Israelites from Egypt. Chag Ha'geulah

H3.text: What is the name of the Jewish spring festival which celebrates the exodus of the Israelites from Egypt. Pɛsaħ

A4.text: Passover, also called Pesach, is a major Jewish holiday that celebrates the Exodus of the Israelites from slavery in Egypt.
